summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Sunnyside Avenue from North 77th Street to North 80th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9632 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
